sense.name: tire mentally or physically
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] EXHAUST NP2[patient[animate]] NP1[stimulus] EXHAUST NP2[patient]
sense.examples: His constant nitpicking exhausts me. Triplets can exhaust their new parents.

sense.name: completely use up a resource
sense.examples: The colonists exhausted their food supplies within two months. Buying a new car will exhaust our savings. Hannah's repeated pleas for more time finally exhausted her teacher's patience.

sense.name: remove a gas from
sense.examples: The engineer should completely exhaust the air brake system such that the pressure in the train line is extremely low. Fans then exhausted the air from the familiar red and white stacks. Gaseous by-products and unreacted Til4 are exhausted from deposition flask 56.
